channel.title: CVE Feed for LINE Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LINE Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5554|2023-10-13T05:40:43.366Z -- line%20corporation -- line%20client%20for%20ios
item.description: Lack of TLS certificate verification in log transmission of a financial module within LINE Client for iOS prior to 13.16.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-1143|2024-02-06T06:59:56.850Z -- line%20corporation -- central%20dogma
item.description: Central Dogma versions prior to 0.64.1 is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), which could allow for the leakage of user sessions and subsequent authentication bypass.

item.title: CVE-2024-1735|2024-02-26T07:45:54.592Z -- line%20corporation -- armeria
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in armeria-saml versions less than 1.27.2, allowing the use of malicious SAML messages to bypass authentication. All users who rely on armeria-saml older than version 1.27.2 must upgrade to 1.27.2 or later.
